name: Planet Defender (itch) (JoeRaig)
description:
• When clicking the bottom right button to switch to full screen mode, the screen sometimes gets cropped and two black stripes appear on both sides of the screen. Press ESC and the full screen button again until the screen adjusts to the right size.
  • If you have any optimization problems on WebGL, try downloading the file to play it on Windows.

Planet Defender is a one-run-level tower defense game set in space. Watch, build and manage your resources to maximize your defense as much as you can. The goal is to defend your planet from waves of enemy ships coming from outer space.


Controls:

WASD / MOUSE – Camera movement

SPACE BAR – Slow down time / Build menu

+- / MOUSE SCROLL – Zoom in/out

ENTER – Center camera

ESC – Menu


DevLog

Originally designed for “Lost Relic Games Game Jam 2022” (June 11th-19th), I couldn't finish it on time due to personal reasons and the complexity of the project. So I spent the next 3 weeks improving it to launch it properly, but it is still a prototype of tower defense to which new features and improvements could be added to make it even more addictive and entertaining.

If you have any suggestions, improvements or questions, please leave a comment.

I hope you enjoy playing it.

Best regards
